author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: loveplay
short: Send love to other members of the server with hugs, kisses, etc.
description: Send love to other members of the server with hugs, kisses, and more, from Purrbot API. To replace built-in hug command, unload 'General' cog and install 'coffeetools' cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
